item.title: [Python] Judgment of backlight image using OpenCV
item.description: ## Introduction Hello, My name is Kano. At ABEJA, I am in charge of customer support for Insight for Retail, a retail service. Recently, I am living a vegan life under the influence of a documentary called Game Changer that I watched on Netflix. However, I sometimes eat Jiro, family, or cottery ramen, so I can’t lose weight. I’m not an engineer, but I will do my best to write it.
